original_text: that you will do us no harm, just as we have not touched you and have done to you nothing but good and have sent you away in peace. You are now the blessed of the Lord.”
korean_text: 너는 우리를 해하지 말라 이는 우리가 너를 범하지 아니하고 선한 일만 네게 행하여 네가 평안히 가게 하였음이니라 이제 너는 여호와께 복을 받은 자니라

sentences.original_text: that you will do us no harm
just as we have not touched you
and have done to you nothing but good
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 당신에게 오직 선한 것만 행했으며

sentences.original_text: and have sent you away in peace
You are now the blessed of the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 이제 주님의 축복을 받은 자입니다
